message.body: It's such a slow night. I'm bed ridden. Haha
Well, it's been a good week. Something bad was bound to happen. Sickness is tolerable. What's new with you?
i hope you feel better! :) i'm going out of town this weekend but i have to leave in like 2 hours so i'm frantically packing and getting ready...
Ill prepared is the way to go. Trips are always better when nothing's ready. I always leave all the essentials with my luck. Where are you headed off to?
fraternity formal in charleston (which is, conveniently, my hometown).
That's quite convenient. My plans are just strolling around the city with friends, granted I get some rest. What're you going to do after college? Stay n Atlanta?
what part of town do you live in? i'm really not sure about my post-college plans. i've got time to decide, though. luckily.
I'm in Columbus most of the week exceot Monday through Sunday, which I'm at a hotel for music work. In june, I'll be a full-time atlant...ian. is that hw you say it?
ATLiens like the rappers say? I dont know
atlantian, i believe. definitely haven't lived here long enough to be an authority.
We'll go with that. Haha. When should we hang out? If you'd still like to, naturally.
well, i'll be back on sunday night, so i guess sometime after that?
Have fun on your trip back home :)
I'd love to be there with you, truly. It looks wonderful! Hey, this is a weird question, but what station is npr in Atlanta? If you know. I can't seem o find it.
Also, that photo would have been infinitely better if you were in it, with a background of the city. Just saying. ;)
